REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1767 reute r f BC-ALLIED-IRISH-BANKS-OP 10-20 0044

TEXT.TITLE: ALLIED IRISH BANKS OPENS TOKYO OFFICE
TEXT.BODY: Allied Irish Banks Plc <ALBK.L> said it plans to open a Tokyo office. Initially it will be a representative office but the company said it hopes to have a full banking licence in about two years. REUTER
